briefTitle: A Study of Tobramycin Inhalation Powder From a Modified Manufacturing Process Versus Placebo
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Multi-Center Phase III Study in Cystic Fibrosis (CF) Subjects to Assess Efficacy, Safety and Pharmacokinetics of Tobramycin Inhalation Powder From a Modified Manufacturing Process (TIPnew).
summary: This study is designed to show how well tobramycin inhalation powder works and how safe it is when produced by a modified manufacturing process

primaryOutcome.measure: Relative Change From Baseline of Forced Expiratory Volume in One Second (FEV1) Percent Predicted to End of Dosing (Day 29)
